type.description: Refers to the graphical asset in ambient_object.gfx

use_animation.description: Used set set if an object is animated or not

visible_in_all_map_modes.description: Used to show is non-terrain mapmodes

scale.description: Sets the scale of the asset. 1.0 is default size.

time_duration.description: Always set to 300 for animated objects, may be redundant

name.description: Name does not have to be unique

hidden_on_start.description: Whether the object is hidden (can be revealed with show_ambient_object)

position.description: Position: Horizontal coordinate, Height coordinate - 0.0 is base, Vertical coordinate

rotation.description: Rotation: Horizontal rotation, Height rotation - this is used for most rotations, Vertical rotation
